services.name: Eyebrows Tint or Eyelash Tint
services.description: Professional tinting service to enhance your brows or lashes with long-lasting color.
services.fullDescription: Add definition and depth to your brows or lashes with our professional tinting service. Using premium, gentle dyes, we enhance your natural color for a fuller, more defined look that lasts for weeks without daily makeup.

services.name: Eyelash Removal
services.description: Safe, professional removal of lash extensions without damaging your natural lashes.
services.fullDescription: Our gentle lash extension removal service safely dissolves the adhesive and removes extensions without harming your natural lashes. Using professional-grade remover and expert technique, we ensure a comfortable, damage-free experience.

services.name: Cluster Eyelash Extensions
services.description: Dramatic volume with cluster lash extensions for special occasions.
services.fullDescription: Create instant drama with our cluster lash extensions, perfect for special events and occasions. These pre-made clusters provide immediate volume and length, giving you glamorous lashes for your big day.

services.name: Lash Lift or Brow Lamination
services.description: Natural enhancement with lash lift or brow lamination for beautifully lifted results.
services.fullDescription: Enhance your natural beauty with a lash lift that curls and lifts your lashes, or brow lamination that creates fuller, more defined brows. Both treatments provide a low-maintenance, natural look that lasts for weeks.

services.name: Lash Lift & Tint
services.description: Complete lash transformation with lift and tint for maximum definition and curl.
services.fullDescription: The ultimate lash enhancement combining a lifting treatment with professional tinting. Your natural lashes are lifted, curled, and darkened for a wide-eyed, defined look that lasts for weeks without mascara.

services.name: 2D (Hybrid Set) Eyelashes
services.description: Natural volume with 2D hybrid lash extensions for everyday beauty.
services.fullDescription: Our 2D Hybrid Set combines classic and volume lash techniques for a natural yet fuller look. Perfect for everyday wear, these extensions add subtle volume and length while maintaining a natural appearance.

services.name: 3D (Volume Set) Eyelashes
services.description: Fuller volume with 3D volume lash extensions for dramatic beauty.
services.fullDescription: Experience luxurious volume with our 3D Volume Set. Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller, more dramatic look while remaining comfortable and natural-looking.

services.name: 4D (Mega Volume) Eyelashes
services.description: Maximum drama with 4D mega volume extensions for show-stopping lashes.
services.fullDescription: Our 4D Mega Volume Set delivers the ultimate in lash drama. Using ultra-lightweight fans of lashes, we create maximum fullness and impact while maintaining comfort. Perfect for those who want the most dramatic, glamorous look.

services.name: Professional Evening Makeup
services.description: Glamorous evening makeup with lash extensions for special occasions.
services.fullDescription: Complete your special event look with our professional evening makeup service, which includes stunning lash extensions. Our expert makeup artists create a flawless, long-lasting look perfect for weddings, galas, and special celebrations.

services.name: Make-Up With Extension Eyelashes
services.description: Professional makeup application with beautiful lash extensions.
services.fullDescription: Get camera-ready with our complete makeup and lash extension service. Our professional makeup artists create a flawless look complemented by gorgeous lash extensions for a stunning, cohesive appearance.

services.name: Brow Lamination & Lash Lamination
services.description: Ultimate combo treatment for perfectly lifted brows and lashes.
services.fullDescription: Transform both your brows and lashes with our comprehensive lamination combo. This treatment lifts and sets your brows while curling and lifting your lashes, creating a complete eye enhancement that lasts for weeks.

services.name: Lip Permanent Make Up Touch Up
services.description: Refresh and enhance your existing lip permanent makeup.
services.fullDescription: Maintain the beautiful color and definition of your permanent lip makeup with our professional touch-up service. We refresh faded pigment and perfect the shape, ensuring your lips stay vibrant and perfectly defined.

services.name: Permanent Make Up Touch Up
services.description: Professional touch-up for any permanent makeup service.
services.fullDescription: Keep your permanent makeup looking fresh and vibrant with our comprehensive touch-up service. Whether it's brows, eyeliner, or lips, we refresh the pigment and refine the shape for continued beautiful results.

services.name: Eyebrow Microshading
services.description: Soft, powdered brow look with microshading permanent makeup.
services.fullDescription: Achieve beautiful, soft-shaded brows with our microshading technique. This permanent makeup method creates a powdered, filled-in look similar to makeup, perfect for those who want fuller-looking brows without the hair-stroke appearance.

services.name: Microblading Eyebrows
services.description: Natural hair-stroke brows with expert microblading technique.
services.fullDescription: Create natural-looking, hair-like strokes with our expert microblading service. This semi-permanent technique manually implants pigment to mimic individual brow hairs, resulting in beautifully defined, natural-looking eyebrows.

services.name: Powder Brows
services.description: Soft, makeup-like brows with powder brow permanent makeup.
services.fullDescription: Achieve the perfect soft, filled-in brow look with our powder brow technique. This permanent makeup method creates a soft, powdery appearance similar to brow makeup, providing natural-looking fullness and definition that lasts.

services.name: Permanent Lip Make Up
services.description: Beautiful, long-lasting lip color and definition with permanent makeup.
services.fullDescription: Wake up with perfectly colored and defined lips every day with our permanent lip makeup service. We enhance your natural lip shape and add beautiful, long-lasting color that eliminates the need for daily lipstick application.
